tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Known Dr. Prashanth since 2009 treated me and family on ortho issues. He guided me prolong my knee replacement for over 2 years efficiently. ultimately replacement was made in 17 January 2020. I am doing very good can walk upto 7kms in single stretch plus excercises for my knee. A doctor who wouldn't prescribe treatment unless required. very friendly and frank, helpful & very simple explanation on pros & cons of treatment.

tags: None
review: Very understanding & cool headed. Displays a lot of patience to listen to your difficulty. Puts one at ease to feel that your problem has a solution so you do not have to worry. Very frank in explaining the problem & explains the possible solutions . Allows one to make choice of the solution & also explains the negatives & positives of each of them. Pleasure to be talking to him

tags: None
review: Doctor is super cool. Listen patiently and makes others feel comfortable in explaining there problems.

tags: None
review: Great.  He is professional and knows his job.  Very pleasant and friendly.  Will definitely visit again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This was for my daughter. He said he will treat her as her own daughter and he did. He cared enough. We didn't know him before and went in emergency. He gave us the right advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Amazing doctor and he understand the problem and suggests appropriate medication. 
He never suggests surgery until he has exhausted with his treatment. He recommends surgery as last resort.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
** ***** ** ***** *** ** ***** Infringement of my wife, he was making fun of my weight ** ****** **** *** * ****** *** **** ***** ** **** **** **** ** ***** ** ** ******* *** *** It was my first meeting and such talks are unwelcome. 

He charged me ₹2,500 for consultation and plaster wrapping, apart from ₹3000 for plaster itself.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very calm doctor listens to patient problem completely and then start diagnosing issue, suggested few tabs where pain relieved and asked to get MRI scanning, advised to get physio treatment for L3-L4 lower back pain.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ** ** ******* ******. he explained the problem in detail. majority of yours problem will get resolved the way he counsel the patient while treatment.. I would recommend Dr.prashant Jain for any Ortho issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Nice experience. He listened to each and every problem. He examined my Father in a proper way. No need to go out for doing X ray too. Much recommended.
